meta.title: From TINKER to BELL
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: A murder has been committed at our Halloween party! Seven witnesses (in costume) have given testimony, in the form of Raddles. Our final witness is Tinker Bell, who no one ever notices but who sees it all. Her hint: you need to solve each Raddle before being able to solve the mystery. Check the previous few Raddles for more hints! [Update: the solution [can be found here](/mystery/whodunit)]
